item.title: An insight on GDP and Happiness
item.description: In this post I would like to discuss about the relation of national Gross Domestic Product and happiness. Below I have visualised data through a scatterplot, which pictures this relation by continent. Before starting with our analysis, please access the full dataset by clicking on the following link https://www.kaggle.com/unsdsn/world-happiness
